DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare algorithm IV sedation dose current standard care patient undergo first trimester surgical abortion . The primary outcome subject ' pain score suction curettage 0-100 21-point scale . Secondary outcome include pain score cervical dilation 15 minute post-procedure , subjective pain rating , incident side effect adverse event , frequency additional dos medication , recovery room time , physician assessment satisfaction pain control . Investigators hypothesize algorithm result improve pain control , decrease frequency additional medication dos , improve patient physician satisfaction , without difference side effect , adverse event recovery room time .
DOC.brief_title: Use Algorithm Determine IV Sedation Dosing During First-trimester Surgical Abortion
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 old seek surgical abortion Planned Parenthood League Massachusetts ( PPLM ) Gestational age less equal 13+6 , confirm ultrasound Eligible surgical abortion accord PPLM protocol Eligible IV sedation per PPLM protocol , desire IV sedation pain management Choice local anesthesia pain control Hypersensitivity midazolam fentanyl Ineligible IV sedation per PPLM protocol Need cervical ripen either misoprostol mechanical priming agent ( laminaria/Dilapan ) Unable unwilling complete require study procedure Previous participation study
